pages.text: While akin to mundane shears, runic shears are specifically designed to reach between the realms and pluck the fey equivalents of items. They can be used to harvest $(l:herbs/wildewheet)wildewheet$() and $(l:herbs/spirit_herb)spirit herb$(), as well as $(l:resources/fey_leather)fey leather$(). $(info) They can also be used to shear sheep, doing so vigorously.
